item.def:
Burn away those extra calories with the fully-equipped state-of-the-art fitness center. Practice on the latest devices and keep fit even on vacation. Our Fitness Center provides world class product such as Technogym and Concept 2 on an area with soft-surfaced floor, a large screen cable TV, a scale with complimentary water and towels. Air-conditioned room overlooking the beautiful garden with natural light.
    Complimentary for all guests
    Located on the first floor next to the boutique and accessible to guests from 7.00 am to 10.00 pm
item.name: Overview
